CustomField.description: When an Item that requires certain options or assignments is linked to the line, the line is considered "Invalid" until all requirements are met. Defaults checked for Items with no requirements, otherwise defaults unchecked.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When an Item that requires certain options or assignments is linked to the line, the line is considered "Invalid" until all requirements are met. Defaults checked for Items with no requirements, otherwise defaults unchecked.
CustomField.label: Is Valid
